text: <@U0289USNA> the hubris of the Ducks' brass is far too strong. i bet we’re stuck with Helf for this year AND probably another. Which is absolutely terrifying. Especially in the long, long, term. It’s pretty clear by now that Helf and crew can’t develop anything other than slot receivers, but it feels like the program is okay with that because it fits better with Nike. I just don’t see a world where Phil Knight is super stoked on bringing in a defensive guy, or really anybody with a new identity.
next week is going to be a disaster
I wouldnt be surprised if the ducks did try to hire Peterson before promoting helfrich.  At that time everybody made peterson a job offer every year, he just turned them all down.
